p: The TR-FIA assay can be modified for detection of virus-specific antibodies by coating the well of the microtiter plate with viral antigen and labeling antihuman immunoglobulin with the lanthanide reporter. The availability of lanthanides with distinct emission spectra allows multiplexing of the assay such that different antibody isotypes (e.g., IgG and IgA) can be measured in the same well [ 83, 84].
